text:
# Trick or Treat

Haunted houses,  
Curdling screams,  
Freezing bats, torn at the seams!  

Full white moon,  
Dripping candles,  
Roaming forgetful zombie randals!  

Gnarled old trees,  
Tossed in the breeze.  
Cold ghosts shivering, knocking their knees!  

Trick and treating,  
From door to door;  
Not enough sweets, I must have more !!!  

by  
Gareth Lancaster
